sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './login.css' import {useFormik} from 'formik' import axios from 'axios' function Login() { const initial={ email:'', password:'', } const headers={ "Content-Type":"application/json", "Accept":"application/json", } const submitlogin=async(value)=> { const loguser=value const logusers=JSON.stringify(loguser) console.warn(logusers) try{ const respo=await axios.post('/login', `${logusers}`,{headers:headers}) toast(respo.data.message, { position: "top-right", autoClose: 2000, hideProgressBar: false, closeOnClick: true, pauseOnHover: true, draggable: true, progress: undefined, }) } catch(errors) { toast(errors.response.data.message, { position: "top-right", autoClose: 2000, hideProgressBar: false, closeOnClick: true, pauseOnHover: true, draggable: true, progress: undefined, type: 'error' }) } } const formik=useFormik({ initialValues:initial, onSubmit:submitlogin }) return ( <>

Login

) } export default Login
